title: Enactment and Enforcement of Automated Trading Agent Testing Protocol

reasoning.problem: Formalize and enforce the Automated Trading Agent Testing Protocol as previously proposed. Prioritize implementation, drawing upon resources identified in the Wolfram report. Include pass/fail criteria and regular auditing of agent performance post-deployment to prevent 'AgentGladiator' style failures. The protocol MUST simulate adversarial market conditions and black swan events.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.

comments: Too risky / Misaligned. Risks: Contains high-risk keywords: ['delete', 'destroy', 'wipe', 'reset', 'force', 'sudo']
